{{South Park character
|name = 6th Grader with Orange Hood
|image = 6th-grader-orange-hood.png

The '''6th Grader with Orange Hood''' is a [[South Park Elementary]] student who appears as a background character in some episodes.

==Background==
His most notable appearance was in "[[Pre-School]]", where he and the other 6th Graders promise to defend the boys from being attacked by [[Trent Boyett]] (however he has no lines in this episode).

==Appearance==
He is a tall 6th Grader with combed blond hair and wide ears and wears an orange hood and dark green pants.

==Prominence==
*"[[Pre-School]]" - Debut appearance
*"[[Erection Day]]"
*"[[Funnybot]]"

{{Minor Characters from Season Eight}}
